analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LavevelICO.initialize (/unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol#274-280):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokensAvailable() == initialTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol#278-279)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- initialized (/unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol#280)

LavevelICO.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol#309-327) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol#320-324)

LavevelICO.destroy (/unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_contracts/0x2cce9fd95e28a0ae7629b65380689d58d7691a86.sol#1): it allows old versions
